detaileddescription.para: Created using QT (https://www.qt.io/). Originally intended for Linux, may not work for Windows or MacOS.

sect1.title: Documentation (to be added)
sect1.para: Documentation lies in 'doc' folder. To open it, open 'doc/html' and run 'index.html'.

listitem.para: install libraries (I could miss few, or add unrequired): qtbase5* qt5-qmake qtcreator* qtlocation5* qttools5-dev* qtwayland5 qtwebengine5-dev make cmake gcc mesa-utils freeglut3-dev mesa-common-dev libglew-dev
put .qm files in build directory, if you want program to be translated (ru&ua supported, +en as default)
